job.jobname: ! EG: Variant gelijk maken in administraties
job.remarks: Variant artikelen in administratie 482 en 484 en 483 worden gelijk gemaakt aan variantartikelen in administratie 400.

step.datasource: select ir.ID as id from itemrelations ir with(nolock) full outer join [400]..itemrelations ir400 with (nolock) on ir.itemcode = ir400.itemcode and ir.ItemCodeRelated = ir400.ItemCodeRelated where case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END = 'Delete'

select ir400.type as type ,ir400.itemcode as itemcode ,ir400.itemcoderelated as itemcoderelated ,ir400.quantity as quantity ,ir400.itemcode as variant, case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END AS Action
from itemrelations ir with(nolock) full outer join [400]..itemrelations ir400 with (nolock) on ir.itemcode = ir400.itemcode and ir.ItemCodeRelated = ir400.ItemCodeRelated inner join items i1 with (nolock) on i1.itemcode = ir400.ItemCode inner join items i2 with (nolock) on i2.itemcode = ir400.ItemCodeRelated where case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END = 'Create'

select ir.ID as id ,ir400.type as type ,ir400.itemcode as itemcode ,ir400.itemcoderelated as itemcoderelated ,ir400.quantity as quantity ,ir400.itemcode as variant, case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END AS Action
from itemrelations ir with(nolock) full outer join [400]..itemrelations ir400 with (nolock) on ir.itemcode = ir400.itemcode and ir.ItemCodeRelated = ir400.ItemCodeRelated inner join items i1 with (nolock) on i1.itemcode = ir400.ItemCode inner join items i2 with (nolock) on i2.itemcode = ir400.ItemCodeRelated where case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END = 'Update'

select ir.ID as id from itemrelations ir with(nolock) full outer join [400]..itemrelations ir400 with (nolock) on ir.itemcode = ir400.itemcode and ir.ItemCodeRelated = ir400.ItemCodeRelated where case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END = 'Delete'

select ir400.type as type ,ir400.itemcode as itemcode ,ir400.itemcoderelated as itemcoderelated ,ir400.quantity as quantity ,ir400.itemcode as variant, case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END AS Action
from itemrelations ir with(nolock) full outer join [400]..itemrelations ir400 with (nolock) on ir.itemcode = ir400.itemcode and ir.ItemCodeRelated = ir400.ItemCodeRelated inner join items i1 with (nolock) on i1.itemcode = ir400.ItemCode inner join items i2 with (nolock) on i2.itemcode = ir400.ItemCodeRelated where case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END = 'Create'

select ir.ID as id ,ir400.type as type ,ir400.itemcode as itemcode ,ir400.itemcoderelated as itemcoderelated ,ir400.quantity as quantity ,ir400.itemcode as variant, case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END AS Action
from itemrelations ir with(nolock) full outer join [400]..itemrelations ir400 with (nolock) on ir.itemcode = ir400.itemcode and ir.ItemCodeRelated = ir400.ItemCodeRelated inner join items i1 with (nolock) on i1.itemcode = ir400.ItemCode inner join items i2 with (nolock) on i2.itemcode = ir400.ItemCodeRelated where case when ir.itemcoderelated is null and ir400.itemcoderelated is not null Then 'Create' when ir400.itemcode is null then 'Delete' when ir.quantity <> ir400.quantity then 'Update' when ir.type <> ir400.type then 'Update' ELSE 'No action' END = 'Update'
